verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Magnificent, Holy Father, I stand in awe of all I see.
Of all the things You have created, and still You choose to think of me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And who am I that You should suffer Your very life to set me free?
The only thing that I can give You is the life You gave to me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is my offering, dear Lord. This is my offering to You, God.
I will give You my life, for it's all I have to give,
Because You gave Your life for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I stand before You at this altar; so many have given You more.
I may not have much I can offer, yet what I have is truly Yours.
